commit cad25de9e14908199e3c17061ca84aceabfa1988
Author: anirudh0228 <anirudhvijay1@gmail.com>
Date:   Sun Jan 13 22:09:53 2019 +0530

    fixes the crashing of app due to orientation change. (#2382)
    
    This makes the Activity(EditImageActivity) to retain it's state even after rotation and hence prevents the app from crashing while inserting text to the image.
    In the AddTextFragment.java file the mTextSticketView was getting null
    due to restarting of the activity due to which the app crashed. This fix
    allows the activiy to retain its state after rotation and hence the
    mTextStickeerView is no longer null.

commit 7044fad4bd6511a64eb055367a6311c5494482e6
Author: Abishek V Ashok <abishekvashok@gmail.com>
Date:   Sat Dec 2 21:54:29 2017 +0530

    .travis.yml: Parallelize gradle jobs (#1508)
    
    Adds parallelizing feature to .travis.yml
    
    Helps to decrease build times by parallelizing the build across
    different isolated virtual environment with the help of Travis CI
    build matrix. Bash scripts are used at each step to check the
    component in execution (of the matrix) and run the commands for
    that particular matrix (component).
    
    Shows about 30% decrease in build times.
    
    Signed-off-by: Abishek V Ashok <abishekvashok@gmail.com>

20	31	.travis.yml
0	0	copy_opencv.sh => scripts/copy_opencv.sh
0	0	download_open_cv.sh => scripts/download_open_cv.sh
15	0	scripts/main_script.sh
0	0	scripts/prep-key.sh
16	0	scripts/prepare_avd.sh
35	0	scripts/upload_apk.sh
0	28	upload-apk.sh
0	42	upload_apk_forks.sh

commit 7b31d95c2bf3d28dcf5537e25f05c1885c5e15b0
Author: Padmal <CloudyPadmal@users.noreply.github.com>
Date:   Wed Mar 22 14:02:58 2017 +0530

    Adds danger to the repository (#170)
    
    Adds danger with android apk links. Now danger will comment it automatically.
    
    Closes #61.
    
    This also adds a script which is for forks to upload their apks to their apk branch for danger to fetch them. The script which uploads builded apk from travis to the apkbranch in the main repository is
    upload-apk.sh. This script was build so that in every PR the apk can be attached as comment
    via danger. The use of using two seperate scripts is to ensure that the token doesnot needed
    to be changed after every pull request merge. Travis will call this script if not in the main
    repository i.e, phimpme-android.
    
    This commit would allow easy moderation and testing improving the apps development process as the counter is increasing at an alarming rate.

5	3	.travis.yml
1	0	CONTRIBUTING.md
18	0	Dangerfile
4	0	Gemfile
41	0	upload_apk_forks.sh

commit dcd5e9ef6df67d94474499e302163d9e5ff4f20f
Author: Varun Kumar <heysadboy@gmail.com>
Date:   Wed Mar 1 12:49:51 2017 +0530

    Commenting the depricated code (#40)
    
    Fix crash by removing managed query usage
    
    Closing of managed cursor leads to crash due to requery of the closed
    cursor on activity resume. Removal of managed query usage fixes the crash.
    
    * Commenting the depricated code
    
    1. Deleting the code gives rise to the build error and simply doing that
    will hinder other functionalities.
    
    2. We simply can not delete the code, places where only certain part of
    the map api is used can be commented.
    
    3. The unused imports must be commented to, they don't give errors but
    hinders in passing.
    
    4. The app is running but the features related to map can not be tested.
